## Matrix.subArrayLength property

The sub-array length for this matrix. The full array needs to be divided in to smaller "sub" arrays which are laied out to cover the matrix. Each sub-array will have the same length which will be wither the width or height of the matrix, depending on the array direction. (beta)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get subArrayLength(): number;

set subArrayLength(newV: number);
```
